description:
漫威制作的2013超级英雄巨制《雷神2：黑暗世界》发布全新预告片，新款预告中展露了大量新镜头，为了抵御反派黑暗精灵来袭，雷神与洛基终于兄弟联手，抖森遭波特曼掌掴？！狡黠的洛基神秘莫测的笑容十足抢戏，电影将于11月8日北美上映，有望引进内地。

Thor is back to save the universe – and of course lock lips with his favourite sexy scientist Jane Foster.

Chris Hemsworth is hunkier than ever as the protagonist in the new official trailer for Thor: The Dark World, which was released on Wednesday.

The sequel is set one year after the events of The Avengers and will see the hero-with-a-hammer take on an enemy older than the universe itself.

Fans of the Marvel comic book series will be excited to see the appearance of Malekith the Accursed as the villain in the blockbuster movie.

Malekith, portrayed by Doctor Who star Christopher Eccleston, is attempting to lead the Dark Elves to plunge the universe into darkness.

Stealing a kiss from Jane, played by Natalie Portman, Thor tells his love interest: ‘I gave you my word I would return for you.’

The confident prince of Asgard also assures the only woman he has eyes for that he will ‘find a way to save us all’.

But it seems that way is to join forces with his disgraced and evil brother Loki, played by Tom Hiddleston.

‘I need your help. But I wish I could trust you,’ Thor tells Loki, who replies: ‘If you did you’d be the fool I always took you for.’

《雷神2：黑暗世界》剧情介绍：

主演：克里斯·海姆斯沃斯，娜塔莉·波特曼，汤姆·希德勒斯顿

上映时间：2013年11月8日

《雷神2》剧情承接《复仇者联盟》，纽约大战结束一年后，带着弟弟洛基回到仙宫的雷神托尔将面对一股远古黑暗势力的挑战——复仇心切的黑暗精灵首领马勒凯斯率领神秘而强大的种族卷土重来，意欲将全宇宙笼罩在黑暗中。面对这样一个连奥丁在内整个仙宫都束手无策的劲敌，雷神不得不踏上最危险的一次征程——这次旅途固然会令他与地球恋人简·福斯特久别重逢，但也将迫使其牺牲一切，唯此才能拯救宇宙。
